parameters: Use this book whenever you want to change
your party member's names. Do you want to
Which name do you want to change?
Are you sure you want to change \N[1]'s name?
Are you sure you want to change \N[2]'s name?
Are you sure you want to change \N[3]'s name?
Are you sure you want to change \N[4]'s name?
Are you sure you want to change \N[5]'s name?
I can help you learn your way around. What
do you want to learn about?
Paladin, Warrior, Mage, Priest and Ranger.
Which class would you like to learn about?
Paladins are Holy Warriors who combine
battle prowess and Holy Magic to keep allies
alive and smite evil! They can use all
weapon and armor types.  Paladins have a low
resistance to magic, but are well fortified
points are Max HP, Attack, Defense, Agility
and Luck.  Their weak points are Magic
Defense, Magic Attack, and Max MP.
That's all I know about Paladins. What else
Warriors are hearty fighters who hack and
slash their way through their foes. They
can use all weapon types as well as all
armor types. They have a very low resitance
to magic, but they make up for it in high HP
and attacks. Warriors' strong points are
Max HP, Attack, Defense, Agility and Luck.
Their weak points are Magic Defense, Max MP,
and Magic Attack. That's all I know about
Warriors. What else can I help you with?
Mages are powerful spellcasters. They have
very low HP, attack and defense, but high MP
Magic Attack, Magic Defense with moderate
Mages can only use light weapons and armor,
due to their lack of physical power. On the
other hand, they can cast Magic spells that
That's all I know about Mages. What else
Priests use Holy spells and physical might
to aid their allies and smite their foes.
Priests are strong in HP, Attack, and
Defense, but are weak against Magic.
Priests can only use flails and swords, and
are able to use all but heavy armor. They
cast Holy Magic to aid their alliess and
That's all I know about Priests. What else
Rangers rain arrows on their foes and use
Nature Magic to cure poisons, buff allies,
and ensnare their foes. Rangers Stats are
well rounded, with moderate amounts of all.
Rangers use bows, crossbows and swords as
well as up to light armor. They learn nature
That's all I know about Rangers. What else
Magic is one of the most powerful abilities
in all of Aethoria. The Magic stats- MP,
Magic Attack, and Magic Defense - determine
the power of the user's magic. Magic users
learn Spells as they level up. Magic comes
in different types. Mages cast Arcane Magic,
Priests and Paladins use Holy magic, and
Rangers are adept at Nature Magic.
That's all I know about Magic. What else
In many towns and in other special places
Tranference". These are places where portals
allow you to travel instantly to another
portal. Before a Hall of Transference can be
used, it's BEAM (Beacon Express Arcane Matrix)
has to be activated. Once activated, the
portals to other activated BEAMs will
appear in the Hall. A portal will only appear
when both the local BEAM, and the BEAM on
To activate a BEAM, simply pull the lever
located nearby. You will see a notice that
the BEAM was activated. In towns, you can
check if a BEAM is active at it's sign.
That's all I know about Transference Portals.
What else can I help you with?
Of course I take requests! What would you

What else can I help you with?
Look at the map of Aethoria?
I've been looking all over for you!
I'm Tobias, your new assistant. We have
some things we need to go over.
Followers are people in the world that can
be recruited to help in your journey.
Recruit them to make your party more powerful
and overcome stronger foes on your journey.
Now that you know about followers, I'm
going to give you your first Quest.
A mage is waiting  outside for you to
recruit her. Be sure to speak with her as
soon as you can. Come back to me after you
"Your First Quest" added to Quest Book
I see you have convinced \N[3] to join you!
Outstanding! This completes your first quest.
I'm going to tell you about some of the
features of this Safe House. You can now
restore your party and save the game from
From now on, use the book on that table
whenever you want to change your party
If you need help, you can use the bookshelves
to learn your way around. Different shelves
have different help topics, so check them all.
"Your First Quest" completed. Quest Book updated.
Remember, some people in the world will want
to help you and can join your party as follwers,
so it's a good idea to talk to everyone you meet.
Talk to the people you meet to find quests
that will help you level up. Sometimes, new
people will appear with new quests.
Come back when you have a full party.
Now that you have a full party, it's time
to expand our search for the Dark Elf of
Lore. I've been researching the old tales.
The legends suggest that the dark elf's lair
is deep within the Forbidden Forest. The
forest is said to be cursed, and few who
The forbidden forest lies across the sea, so
you are going to need a ship to get there.
Head to Berkhamsted, where you'll find a
He's the captain of, 'The Wavebreaker' and
known for taking on adventurous souls like
you. Do you accept the quest?
Go see Captain Marlow in Berkhamsted.
I'm doing research. I'll let you know when
From what I was able to find, we need a powerful sword
that was made by Tor Endrafang ...
Tor Endrafang is a renowned Blacksmith who lives on the
Wasted Isle. You'll need to take the ship to get there.
Travel Southeast until you come to a barren island ...
The you will find the Dwarf Lord Tor Endrafang.
Come back of you change your mind.

In many towns and in other special places
Tranference". These are places where portals
allow you to travel instantly to another
portal. Before a Hall of Transference can be
used, it's BEAM (Beacon Express Arcane Matrix)
has to be activated. Once activated, the
portals to other activated BEAMs will
appear in the Hall. A portal will only appear
when both the local BEAM, and the BEAM on
To activate a BEAM, simply pull the lever
located nearby. You will see a notice that
the BEAM was activated. In towns, you can
check if a BEAM is active at it's sign.
That's all I know about Transference Portals.
